nl.helixsoft.recordstream

Class TsvRecordStream.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.helixsoft.recordstream.TsvRecordStream.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    TsvRecordStream

    public static class TsvRecordStream.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder for configuration options.

    All the various configuration options are available through this builder. Once the configuration is complete, call the get() method to obtain the actual RecordStream.

    Each configuration method returns this, so the configuration can be chained.

      • removeOptionalQuotes

        public TsvRecordStream.Builder removeOptionalQuotes()
        If a field is surrounded by '"' quotes, remove them. Particularly useful for CSV files. for the combination of commaSeparated and removeOptionalQuotes, use the function StringUtils.quotedCommaSplit, to deal correctly with comma's inside quotes //TODO: currently doesn't handle newlines within quotes, as per the semi-official specification: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Comma-separated_values

      • setHeader

        public TsvRecordStream.Builder setHeader(java.lang.String[] header)
        Instead of using the first line as a header line, set the values of the header you would like to see.

        Implies that there is no header line in the data.

      • setHeader

        public TsvRecordStream.Builder setHeader(java.util.List<java.lang.String> header)
        Instead of using the first line as a header line, set the values of the header you would like to see.

        Implies that there is no header line in the data.
